short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The codebird companion extension. Press the icon on a setup domain to activate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Codebird companion extension. Press the icon on a website that you have setup on https://codebird.app to edit it. This extension requires you to first create a codebird account on codebird.app.

Codebird is an app that you can install on your github codebase and then when you go to your website you can select text and change it right there. Codebird figures out the rest for you and makes the needed changes to your code in github via a pull request.
